title: Jibiz

content: I just learnt about this forum from a brother I visited. Haven scrolled some posts here, I was impressed and interested in this crypto forum.All I need is the way forward.

comments.author: ImThour
comments.body: The way forward is by reading more and creating fewer topics. It's your second thread in 1 hour with little to no context, and zero addition to the community which you are impressed with.I would rather prefer you to go and browse the forum, try to make more posts rather than threads. However there is nothing wrong by creating a thread but yours are of no use at all.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Welcome to the forum, Jibiz! To answer your question, the way forward is entirely up to you and your goals. Do you want to become a crypto investor? There's plenty of information here to help you get started. Or maybe you're more interested in the underlying technology and its potential applications in different industries. Regardless, this forum is an excellent resource for anyone willing to put in the time and effort to learn more.

comments.author: DiMarxist
comments.body: Your way forward is to aquire some knowledge how to invest cryptocurrency and understanding, and always follow the rules and regulations on an investment, and exciting experience in crypto . Before investing in any cryptocurrency, it's important to do your own research. Learn about the technology behind each coin, their price history, and any recent news or developments related to them. Try to be a long-term holder and focus on the crypto investment and understand the market. And don't fear or panic when you are investing, when the price is up to your satisfaction you sell it, and if the price is not up to your satisfaction you hold it.

comments.body: Quote from: Jibiz on May 13, 2023, 04:36:03 PMI just learnt about this forum from a brother I visited. Haven scrolled some posts here, I was impressed and interested in this crypto forum.All I need is the way forward.There are many ways forward here in this forum; it all depends on the motive that brought you here. If you are here to learn and acquire knowledge, then the best thing for you to do is to start exploring the place. Just as ImThour said, you can actually use the forum search button to help you discover questions that have been asked by previous members and answers given to them. You can also ask questions under existing threads, which is much simpler than creating a new thread for the same questions and problems that have been answered and solved before.There have been numerous lists and links already suggested by different members above; just go through those threads and familiarize yourself with the forum, and I believe I will continue seeing you around with your contribution to the forum.

comments.author: Daniel91
comments.body: OP, welcome to this forum.If you want us to give you concrete proposals and ideas for the way forward, you must tell us more about your interests and plans.Are you interested in the technology behind bitcoin or want to trade bitcoins on exchanges? Maybe you just want to make a one-time investment in bitcoin and hold it in your wallet until it reaches your desired price? Maybe you want to get involved in some project on this forum that pays in btc like translation or design work?Please let us know so that we can help you more.
